item.description:
Hey Professionals !

 

Let's have some good old fashioned breakfast at Primavera's!  We can mix, mingle, and converse about whatever comes to mind.  Yes, I have been here before and the breakfast is decent and inexpensive.  The service is pretty fast as well.   They have a parking lot and it's free! Please make sure to check out their menu before hand!

http://www.theprimaverarestaurant.com/breakfastmenu.html

 

If you can't make this meetup please be respectful and do not RSVP.  If something comes up please make sure to change your RSVP in a timely fashion.  No-Shows are a no-no! and please be on time. Thank you and I look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Breakfast @ Primavera Restaurant
